name: NertWorks Site Wide SSL
author: Nickolas Ormond and Allen Smith

sections.description:
Enforce SSL throughout the entire site. Supporting multiple methods. Can be used on the Front End of the site of the Admin Dashboard

A brief Markdown

Ordered list:

  1. javascript redirection supported
  2. PHP redirection supported
  3. WP redirection supported
  4. Includes diagnostic tools
  5. Supports Dashboard and website redirection
sections.installation:
1. Upload nertworks-site-wide-ssl to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this an awesome plugin that will make popups for me?

Yes, these things are true.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • javascript or PHP redirect method

1.02

  • Added wp_direct

1.03

  • Perfected some things and added tools
